title: AI Job Application using LangChain
features: Designed and implemented a modular agentic RAG pipeline with LangChain, enabling dynamic retrieval and generation of personalized job application content for users.
Built scalable backend services in Python (FastAPI) that integrate advanced NLP models and custom embeddings for semantic search, improving content relevance by 40%.
Developed end‑to‑end email automation and PDF generation modules using PyPDF2 and BeautifulSoup, cutting manual processing time by 70% for recruiters.
